text: Beth Behrs (born December 26, 1985) is an American actress. She stars in the CBS sitcom 2 Broke Girls. Her first movie role was in American Pie Presents: The Book of Love. Behrs was born on December 26, 1985 in Lancaster, Pennsylvania. , Behrs' boyfriend and husband was actor Michael Gladis. They married in 2018. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Pennsylvania
title: Beth Behrs
